DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore long-term effect orthotics imposes structure function foot . The objective study determine use custom-made foot orthotics ( CFO ) cause : ( ) change structure plantar intrinsic muscle , ( b ) change rate muscle activity time plantar intrinsic muscle ( c ) create change balance control gait termination . The aim study enhance appropriate dispensing orthotics , whether additional measure , rehabilitation exercise necessary increase overall effectiveness clinical setting .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects 12-week Custom-made Orthotic Intervention Structure Function Foot Healthy Young Adults During Gait Termination
DOC.detailed_description: Between 20-30 healthy young adult male female recruit . A screening questionnaire administer ensure participant appropriate study . Once participant meet criterion study , participant randomly allocate one two group : ( ) control group ( b ) intervention group . Individuals select intervention group , fit custom-made orthotics experience pedorthist . The pedorthist cast foot posture use foam impression custom design foot orthotic . The participant week acclimatize new environment , discomfort arises pedorthist make necessary correction participant another week acclimatize orthotic . The control group receive intervention ask go daily life activity . All participant undergo test procedure 6 12 week baseline test . At baseline , 6 week 12 week post-baseline , researcher take diagnostic ultrasound image foot muscle prior gait trial . The researcher also place 12 infrared marker surface electrode participant . All trial perform barefoot . The participant undergo gait termination protocol . Participants walk 8m walk-way three force plate embed ground . Participants ask walk end platform instruct stop . For 20 % gait trial , participant walk forward hear audio buzzer sound signal terminate gait suddenly next two step . All trial randomize .
DOC.criteria: score ( +5 ) Foot Posture Index ( FPI ) navicular height < 3.6cm able walk worn CFOs past year , current low limb injury , leg foot pain neurological musculoskeletal disorder affect function foot previous history lower limb surgery protein intake recommended daily allowance ( RDA ) medication effect balance .
